Home » 15A1 Ekakanipātapāḷi » 18 Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
18.17--20
Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
398--401.
444Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti…  vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti…  cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti…  vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti… .
<< 18.13--16 up18.21--25 >>
